siteMetadata.title: HPCng
siteMetadata.description: HPCng is an open community of people and organizations interested in the broad modernization of HPC capabilities across a wide range of use-cases ranging from traditional HPC to enterprise and hyper-scale workloads.

Preamble

The purpose of this document is to articulate the motivation behind the organizational structure of The Next Generation of High-Performance Computing (HPCng).

Structure

To be determined
